DR. C. K. EDMUNDS
LEAVES FOR DETROIT
Dr. Charles K. Edmunds,
provost of the University,
left Thursday for Detroit to
attend a dinner of the Hopkins alumni of that city.
This is one of several trips
that Dr. Edmunds has been
making in order to organize
Hopkins alumni in various
cities of the United States.
Dr. Edmunds is also attempting to enlist their support in the proposed new
plan of the University. He
expects to return Monday.

DR. C. K. EDMUNDS
LEAVES FOR DETROIT
Dr. Charles K. Edmunds,
provost of the University,
left Thursday for Detroit to
attend a dinner of the Hopkins alumni of that city.
This is one of several trips
that Dr. Edmunds has been
making in order to organize
Hopkins alumni in various
cities of the United States.
Dr. Edmunds is also attempting to enlist their support in the proposed new
plan of the University. He
expects to return Monday.
